_sText:
This map was an idea in my head for the past 4 years, now it's finally here. 

fy_chase

is the name and it is based on 2 moving trains moving at the same speed side by side in a subway tunnel.

One train for terrorists and one for counter-terrorists. Both teams must fight by either shooting from one carraige to the other, or for the ones that want to be more risky. jump onto the oppositions train.

This map was a very difficult map to make.

Thanks and enjoy this new production.

(p.s) if your just viewing the map, first time you enter the map, please type kill into the console to activate the train. as things won't work unless the game starts.

credits: executive producer (working tunnels) : Sabr3wulf
